question:
In light of WHO describing the Anti-Microbial Resistance Multi- Partner Trust Fund as one of the 2019 global health bright spots, consider the following statements about the AMR Trust Fund:
  1. The Food and Agricultural Organisation is involved in this partnership.
  2. The fund has a scope till 2025.
Which of the above statements is/are true?
explanation: Statement 1 is correct: The Anti- Microbial Resistance Multi- Partner Trust Fund involves the FAO. Apart from WHO and FAO, the OIE or the World Organisation for Animal Health is also involved. The AMR trust fund was set up to tackle the issue of anti- microbial resistance, which is being described as a ‘silent tsunami’.  Statement 2 is incorrect: The AMR Trust Fund is to function till 2024. It was set up in mid 2019 and has a scope of 5 years. The fund is to be used in aiding countries tackle immediate threats from anti- microbial resistance. The fund will help in implementation of the 2019- 2020 AMR Workplan.
